abstract: The Devils have dedicated part of their official Web site to news and results of New Jersey high school and youth hockey.
snippet: The Devils have dedicated part of their official Web site to news and results of New Jersey high school and youth hockey.
lead_paragraph: NEWARK -- If you want up-to-date statistics for the players on the New Jersey Devils, the team's official Web site is a wise place to click. If you want to find out how the Hackensack Comets, Edison Eagles, Livingston Lancers, Don Bosco Prep Ironman and all the other New Jersey high school ice hockey teams are faring, you can also go to Devils.nhl.com.

headline.main: Devils Become Digital Host for New Jersey Youth Hockey
